subtitleNullable: A comprehensive dataset of India's renowned personalities gender sorted.
descriptionNullable:
- This dataset contains a curated collection of images featuring famous personalities from India, meticulously sorted by gender. 
- Dataset have a diverse set of images for each personality, featuring different poses, attires, and appearances. 
- The accompanying CSV file includes essential information such as file_name, person_name, gender and 
   total_of_each(appearances for each personality). 
- Researchers and enthusiasts can leverage this dataset for gender-based analysis, facial recognition experiments, 
   or building applications related to Indian public figures.

CSV Fields:
- file_name: The filename of the image
- person_name: The name of the famous personality
- gender: The gender of the famous personality
- total_of_each: The frequency of appearances of each personality in the dataset
title: India Famous Personalities Image Dataset
subtitle: A comprehensive dataset of India's renowned personalities gender sorted.
description:
- This dataset contains a curated collection of images featuring famous personalities from India, meticulously sorted by gender. 
- Dataset have a diverse set of images for each personality, featuring different poses, attires, and appearances. 
- The accompanying CSV file includes essential information such as file_name, person_name, gender and 
   total_of_each(appearances for each personality). 
- Researchers and enthusiasts can leverage this dataset for gender-based analysis, facial recognition experiments, 
   or building applications related to Indian public figures.

CSV Fields:
- file_name: The filename of the image
- person_name: The name of the famous personality
- gender: The gender of the famous personality
- total_of_each: The frequency of appearances of each personality in the dataset
